name: Dice Bullet
description:
Chaos! You are the sheriff and you just got found by the criminals running the casino.

Use your guns to take down your foes. These are dice-powered guns, so their fire power is based on your luck!

Instructions

  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys, use your mouse to aim and shoot.
  • Every time you shoot, a dice is shown at the top of the screen. This is the gun's fire power, and it's (mostly) random!
  • Guns: change between them with your mouse wheel.
    • Shotgun: Fires all bullets at once. No cool-down for this one!
    • Machine Gun: Shoots bullets one after the other. The total number of them is triple the dice result.
    • Rocket Launcher: Shoots rockets!
    • Dynamite: Explodes after 2 seconds, with a bigger explosion than rockets.
  • Dice: change the dice to use with keys 1-4.
    • Normal dice: A 6-faced dice. It never runs out!
    • Weird dice: Their faces are changed, so different probabilities for different values.
    • 2 dices: Gets the maximum value of 2 dice rolls, so higher chances to get decent power.
